title: How to become an URF God: A step by step guide by TheLittlestLulu
body:
**Step 1:** Pick {{champion:117}} 

*Don't worry about her getting banned. Nobody ever bans her.*

**Step 2: ** Spam laugh.

*Make sure you set your laugh to 2 different keys in case one of them wears out in the match. If you go more than 10 seconds without laughing you will lose the match.*

**Step 3:** Mash all your keys until things happen.

*You're playing Lulu so just cast spells on stuff until everything tastes purple.*

**Step 4: ** Build {{item:3060}}

*Banner has a 24 second cd, meaning you will be able to use it once every wave. TP into any lane with an enemy AP and watch them flail uselessly at your army of magic immune super-dudes.
*

If you followed my guide correctly you will be swimming in precious URF elo and will become The Hugest Lulu.
Remember, URF is serious business. Use my guide if you want to be a winner.
